# webkitDisplayingFullscreen

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the video is displaying in fullscreen mode.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute boolean webkitDisplayingFullscreen;
```

## Discussion

`true` if displaying in fullscreen mode; otherwise, `false`.

## Displaying Video Fullscreen

- **webkitEnterFullscreen**: Enters fullscreen mode.
- **webkitExitFullscreen**: Exits fullscreen mode.
- **webkitSupportsFullscreen**: A Boolean value indicating whether the video can be played in fullscreen mode.
- **webkitWirelessVideoPlaybackDisabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether wireless video playback is disabled.
- **webkitEnterFullScreen**: Use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/htmlvideoelement/1633500-webkitenterfullscreen].
- **webkitExitFullScreen**: Use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/htmlvideoelement/1629468-webkitexitfullscreen].
